DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety intra-oral topical ketoprofen treatment acute migraine .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Intra-oral Topical Ketoprofen Treatment Acute Migraine
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis Migraine per IHS aura Established diagnosis Migraine per IHS without aura At least 2 migraine per month At least 18 year age Pregnancy Lactation Other Headache Conditions include basilar , hemiplegic , ophthalmoplegic migraine Chronic Daily Headache Allergy Sensitivity NSAIDs Other Severe Medical Conditions include GI bleeding , blood dyscrasia , thrombocytopenia
